#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <vector>
#include <cstdio>
#include <string>

using namespace std;

string n;

int main ()
{
	int tc;
	cin >> tc;
	while (tc--)
	{
		cin >> n;
		
		if (next_permutation(n.begin(), n.end()))
				cout << n << endl;
		else
				cout << "-1\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
